sqlMap.sql:
SELECT ROWNUM RN , T1.PRJ_ID , T1.PRJ_NM , T1.PRJ_GRP_ID , T1.PRJ_GRP_NM , T1.USR_SEL_PRJ_ORD , T1.REQ_ID , T1.REQ_ORD , T1.REQ_CLS_ID , T1.REQ_CLS_NM , T1.REQ_USR_ID , T1.REQ_USR_NM , T1.REQ_DTM , T1.REQ_USR_DEPT_ID , T1.REQ_USR_DEPT_NM , T1.REQ_USR_EMAIL , T1.REQ_USR_NUM , T1.REQ_USR_IMG_ID , T1.REQ_NM , T1.REQ_PW , T1.REQ_CHARGER_ID , T1.REQ_CHARGER_NM , T1.REQ_CHARGER_IMG_ID , T1.REQ_ST_DTM , T1.REQ_ED_DTM , T1.REQ_ST_DU_DTM , T1.REQ_ED_DU_DTM , T1.REQ_PRO_TYPE , T1.REQ_PRO_TYPE_NM , T1.REQ_NEW_TYPE , T1.REQ_NEW_TYPE_NM , T1.REQ_ACCEPT_TXT , T1.REQ_TYPE_CD , T1.REQ_TYPE_NM , T1.ATCH_FILE_ID , T1.CB_ATCH_FILE_ID , T1.MILESTONE_ID , T1.PROCESS_ID , T1.PROCESS_NM , T1.FLOW_ID , T1.FLOW_NM , T1.USE_CD , T1.REQ_KEY , T1.REQ_MIDDLE_DONE_TXT , T1.REG_DTM , T1.REG_DTM_DAY , T1.REG_USR_ID , T1.REG_USR_IP , T1.MODIFY_DTM , T1.MODIFY_USR_ID , T1.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID , SF_PRJ1000_GRP_NM(A.PRJ_ID) AS PRJ_NM , A.PRJ_GRP_ID , SF_PRJ1000_GRP_NM(A.PRJ_GRP_ID) AS PRJ_GRP_NM , DECODE(A.PRJ_ID, #prjId#, '1', '2') AS USR_SEL_PRJ_ORD , A.REQ_ID , A.REQ_ORD , A.REQ_CLS_ID , NVL(SF_REQ2000_REQ_CLS_NM(A.PRJ_ID, A.REQ_CLS_ID, '1'), '') AS REQ_CLS_NM , A.REQ_USR_ID , NVL(REQ_USR_NM, SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_USR_ID, '1')) AS REQ_USR_NM , TO_CHAR(A.REQ_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REQ_DTM , A.REQ_USR_DEPT_ID , A.REQ_USR_DEPT_NM , A.REQ_USR_EMAIL , A.REQ_USR_NUM , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_USR_ID, '6') AS REQ_USR_IMG_ID , A.REQ_NM , A.REQ_DESC , NVL2(A.REQ_PW, 'Y', 'N') AS REQ_PW , A.REQ_CHARGER_ID , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_CHARGER_ID, 1) AS REQ_CHARGER_NM , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_CHARGER_ID, 6) AS REQ_CHARGER_IMG_ID , NVL2(A.REQ_ST_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ST_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '') REQ_ST_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_ED_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '') REQ_ED_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_ST_DU_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ST_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') , '') REQ_ST_DU_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') , '') REQ_ED_DU_DTM , A.REQ_PRO_TYPE , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00008', A.REQ_PRO_TYPE, '1') AS REQ_PRO_TYPE_NM , A.REQ_NEW_TYPE , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00009', A.REQ_NEW_TYPE, '1') AS REQ_NEW_TYPE_NM , A.REQ_ACCEPT_TXT , A.REQ_TYPE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00012', A.REQ_TYPE_CD, '1') AS REQ_TYPE_NM , A.ATCH_FILE_ID , A.CB_ATCH_FILE_ID , A.MILESTONE_ID , A.PROCESS_ID , '' AS PROCESS_NM , A.FLOW_ID , '' AS FLOW_NM , A.USE_CD , A.REQ_KEY , A.REQ_MIDDLE_DONE_TXT , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DTM , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DTM_DAY , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , TO_CHAR(A.MODIFY_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM (SELECT * FROM REQ4100) A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
AND A.ATCH_FILE_ID IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC , A.REG_DTM DESC
ORDER BY A.REQ_PRO_TYPE ASC, USR_SEL_PRJ_ORD ASC, PRJ_NM ASC, TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(A.REQ_ORD, '[^0-9]')) DESC NULLS LAST, A.REQ_DTM DESC, A.REG_DTM DESC
) T1 WHERE 1 = 1
AND T1.REQ_PRO_TYPE = #searchTargetData#
AND T1.PRJ_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.PRJ_GRP_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.REQ_KEY LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.REQ_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(T1.REQ_DESC, '<[^>]*>', '') LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.REQ_USR_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.REQ_USR_EMAIL LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.REQ_USR_NUM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.REQ_DTM >= TO_DATE(#searchStartDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND T1.REQ_DTM <= TO_DATE(#searchEndDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND T1.REQ_DTM >= TO_DATE(#searchStartDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND T1.REQ_DTM <= TO_DATE(#searchEndDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')

SELECT ROWNUM RN , T1.PRJ_ID , T1.PRJ_NM , T1.PRJ_GRP_ID , T1.PRJ_GRP_NM , T1.USR_SEL_PRJ_ORD , T1.REQ_ID , T1.REQ_ORD , T1.REQ_CLS_ID , T1.REQ_CLS_NM , T1.REQ_USR_ID , T1.REQ_USR_NM , T1.REQ_DTM , T1.REQ_USR_DEPT_ID , T1.REQ_USR_DEPT_NM , T1.REQ_USR_EMAIL , T1.REQ_USR_NUM , T1.REQ_USR_IMG_ID , T1.REQ_NM , T1.REQ_DESC , T1.REQ_PW , T1.REQ_CHARGER_ID , T1.REQ_CHARGER_NM , T1.REQ_CHARGER_IMG_ID , T1.REQ_ST_DTM , T1.REQ_ED_DTM , T1.REQ_ST_DU_DTM , T1.REQ_ED_DU_DTM , T1.REQ_PRO_TYPE , T1.REQ_PRO_TYPE_NM , T1.REQ_NEW_TYPE , T1.REQ_NEW_TYPE_NM , T1.REQ_ACCEPT_TXT , T1.REQ_TYPE_CD , T1.REQ_TYPE_NM , T1.ATCH_FILE_ID , T1.CB_ATCH_FILE_ID , T1.MILESTONE_ID , T1.PROCESS_ID , T1.PROCESS_NM , T1.FLOW_ID , T1.FLOW_NM , T1.USE_CD , T1.REQ_KEY , T1.REQ_MIDDLE_DONE_TXT , T1.FVR_ID , T1.FVR_USE_CD , T1.FVR_ORD , T1.REG_DTM , T1.REG_DTM_DAY , T1.REG_USR_ID , T1.REG_USR_IP , T1.MODIFY_DTM , T1.MODIFY_USR_ID , T1.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID , SF_PRJ1000_GRP_NM(A.PRJ_ID) AS PRJ_NM , A.PRJ_GRP_ID , SF_PRJ1000_GRP_NM(A.PRJ_GRP_ID) AS PRJ_GRP_NM , DECODE(A.PRJ_ID, #prjId#, '1', '2') AS USR_SEL_PRJ_ORD , A.REQ_ID , A.REQ_ORD , A.REQ_CLS_ID , NVL(SF_REQ2000_REQ_CLS_NM(A.PRJ_ID, A.REQ_CLS_ID, '1'), '') AS REQ_CLS_NM , A.REQ_USR_ID , NVL(REQ_USR_NM, SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_USR_ID, '1')) AS REQ_USR_NM , TO_CHAR(A.REQ_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REQ_DTM , A.REQ_USR_DEPT_ID , A.REQ_USR_DEPT_NM , A.REQ_USR_EMAIL , A.REQ_USR_NUM , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_USR_ID, '6') AS REQ_USR_IMG_ID , A.REQ_NM
, REGEXP_REPLACE(A.REQ_DESC, '<[^>]*>', ' ') AS REQ_DESC
, NVL2(A.REQ_PW, 'Y', 'N') AS REQ_PW , A.REQ_CHARGER_ID , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_CHARGER_ID, 1) AS REQ_CHARGER_NM , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_CHARGER_ID, 6) AS REQ_CHARGER_IMG_ID , NVL2(A.REQ_ST_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ST_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '') REQ_ST_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_ED_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '') REQ_ED_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_ST_DU_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ST_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') , '') REQ_ST_DU_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') , '') REQ_ED_DU_DTM , A.REQ_PRO_TYPE , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00008', A.REQ_PRO_TYPE, '1') AS REQ_PRO_TYPE_NM , A.REQ_NEW_TYPE , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00009', A.REQ_NEW_TYPE, '1') AS REQ_NEW_TYPE_NM , A.REQ_ACCEPT_TXT , A.REQ_TYPE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00012', A.REQ_TYPE_CD, '1') AS REQ_TYPE_NM , A.ATCH_FILE_ID , A.CB_ATCH_FILE_ID , A.MILESTONE_ID , A.PROCESS_ID , '' AS PROCESS_NM , A.FLOW_ID , '' AS FLOW_NM , A.USE_CD , A.REQ_KEY , A.REQ_MIDDLE_DONE_TXT , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DTM , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DTM_DAY , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , TO_CHAR(A.MODIFY_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP , B.FVR_ID , B.FVR_USE_CD , CASE WHEN B.FVR_USE_CD = '01' THEN '1' ELSE '2' END FVR_ORD FROM (SELECT * FROM REQ4100) A LEFT JOIN STM2002 B ON ( A.REQ_ID = B.FVR_DATA1 AND B.FVR_TYPE = '05') WHERE 1=1 AND A.REQ_CHARGER_ID = #usrId# ) T1 WHERE 1 = 1
AND T1.REQ_ORD LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.REQ_PRO_TYPE = #searchTargetData#
AND T1.PRJ_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.PRJ_GRP_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.REQ_KEY LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.REQ_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(T1.REQ_DESC, '<[^>]*>', '') LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.REQ_USR_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.REQ_USR_EMAIL LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.REQ_USR_NUM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND T1.REQ_DTM >= TO_DATE(#searchStartDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND T1.REQ_DTM <= TO_DATE(#searchEndDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND T1.REG_DTM >= TO_DATE(#searchStartDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND T1.REG_DTM <= TO_DATE(#searchEndDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
ORDER BY T1.FVR_ORD ASC, T1.MODIFY_DTM DESC, T1.REQ_PRO_TYPE ASC

SELECT T1.*, ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID , SF_PRJ1000_GRP_NM(A.PRJ_ID) AS PRJ_NM , A.PRJ_GRP_ID , SF_PRJ1000_GRP_NM(A.PRJ_GRP_ID) AS PRJ_GRP_NM , DECODE(A.PRJ_ID, #prjId#, '1', '2') AS USR_SEL_PRJ_ORD , A.REQ_ID , A.REQ_ORD , A.REQ_CLS_ID , NVL(SF_REQ2000_REQ_CLS_NM(A.PRJ_ID, A.REQ_CLS_ID, '1'), '') AS REQ_CLS_NM , A.REQ_USR_ID , NVL(REQ_USR_NM, SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_USR_ID, '1')) AS REQ_USR_NM , TO_CHAR(A.REQ_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REQ_DTM , A.REQ_USR_DEPT_ID , A.REQ_USR_DEPT_NM , A.REQ_USR_EMAIL , A.REQ_USR_NUM , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_USR_ID, '6') AS REQ_USR_IMG_ID , A.REQ_NM , NVL2(A.REQ_PW, 'Y', 'N') AS REQ_PW , A.REQ_CHARGER_ID , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_CHARGER_ID, 1) AS REQ_CHARGER_NM , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_CHARGER_ID, 6) AS REQ_CHARGER_IMG_ID , NVL2(A.REQ_ST_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ST_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '') AS REQ_ST_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_ED_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '') AS REQ_ED_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_ST_DU_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ST_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') , '') AS REQ_ST_DU_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') , '') AS REQ_ED_DU_DTM , A.REQ_PRO_TYPE , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00008', A.REQ_PRO_TYPE, '1') AS REQ_PRO_TYPE_NM , A.REQ_NEW_TYPE , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00009', A.REQ_NEW_TYPE, '1') AS REQ_NEW_TYPE_NM , A.REQ_ACCEPT_TXT , A.REQ_TYPE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00012', A.REQ_TYPE_CD, '1') AS REQ_TYPE_NM , A.ATCH_FILE_ID , A.CB_ATCH_FILE_ID , A.MILESTONE_ID , A.PROCESS_ID , '' AS PROCESS_NM , A.FLOW_ID , '' AS FLOW_NM , A.USE_CD , A.REQ_KEY , A.REQ_MIDDLE_DONE_TXT , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DTM , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DTM_DAY , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , TO_CHAR(A.MODIFY_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP , REGEXP_REPLACE(A.REQ_DESC, '<[^>]*>', ' ') AS REQ_DESC , C.REQ_GRP_ID , C.REQ_GRP_NM , C.REQ_GRP_DESC FROM (SELECT * FROM REQ4100) A INNER JOIN REQ3001 B ON (A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.REQ_ID = B.REQ_ID) INNER JOIN REQ3000 C ON (B.PRJ_GRP_ID = C.PRJ_GRP_ID AND B.REQ_GRP_ID = C.REQ_GRP_ID AND C.USE_CD = '01') WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
ORDER BY A.REQ_PRO_TYPE ASC, USR_SEL_PRJ_ORD ASC, PRJ_NM ASC, TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(A.REQ_ORD, '[^0-9]')) DESC NULLS LAST, A.REQ_DTM DESC, A.REG_DTM DESC ) T1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.REQ_PW = 'N'
AND ( T1.REQ_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchDataTxt# ||'%' OR REGEXP_REPLACE(T1.REQ_DESC, '<[^>]*>', '') LIKE '%'|| #searchDataTxt# ||'%' )
sqlMap.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM (
) Z

SELECT Z.* FROM (
) Z WHERE 1 = 1 AND Z.RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM (
) Z

SELECT Z.* FROM (
) Z WHERE 1 = 1 AND Z.RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#
SELECT A.REQ_PW AS REQ_PW FROM REQ4100 A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId# AND A.USE_CD = '01'
SELECT NVL2(A.REQ_ID, 'Y', 'N') AS REQ_AUTH FROM REQ4100 A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId# AND ( A.REQ_USR_ID = #usrId# OR A.REQ_CHARGER_ID = #usrId# )

SELECT '' AS RN , A.PRJ_ID , SF_PRJ1000_GRP_NM(A.PRJ_ID) AS PRJ_NM , A.PRJ_GRP_ID , SF_PRJ1000_GRP_NM(A.PRJ_GRP_ID) AS PRJ_GRP_NM , DECODE(A.PRJ_ID, #prjId#, '1', '2') AS USR_SEL_PRJ_ORD , A.REQ_ID , A.REQ_ORD , A.REQ_CLS_ID , NVL(SF_REQ2000_REQ_CLS_NM(A.PRJ_ID, A.REQ_CLS_ID, '1'), '') AS REQ_CLS_NM , A.REQ_USR_ID , NVL(REQ_USR_NM, SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_USR_ID, '1')) AS REQ_USR_NM , TO_CHAR(A.REQ_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REQ_DTM , NVL(A.REQ_USR_DEPT_ID, '') AS REQ_USR_DEPT_ID , NVL(A.REQ_USR_DEPT_NM, SF_STM6000_DEPT_NM(#licGrpId#,A.REQ_USR_DEPT_ID,2)) AS REQ_USR_DEPT_NM , NVL(A.REQ_USR_EMAIL, SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_USR_ID, '2')) AS REQ_USR_EMAIL , NVL(A.REQ_USR_NUM, SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_USR_ID, '3')) AS REQ_USR_NUM , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_USR_ID, '6') AS REQ_USR_IMG_ID , A.REQ_NM , A.REQ_DESC , A.REQ_PW , A.REQ_CHARGER_ID , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_CHARGER_ID, 1) AS REQ_CHARGER_NM , SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_CHARGER_ID, 6) AS REQ_CHARGER_IMG_ID , NVL2(A.REQ_ST_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ST_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '') REQ_ST_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_ED_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '') REQ_ED_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_ST_DU_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ST_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') , '') REQ_ST_DU_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') , '') REQ_ED_DU_DTM , A.REQ_PRO_TYPE , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00008', A.REQ_PRO_TYPE, '1') AS REQ_PRO_TYPE_NM , A.REQ_NEW_TYPE , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00009', A.REQ_NEW_TYPE, '1') AS REQ_NEW_TYPE_NM , A.REQ_ACCEPT_TXT , A.REQ_TYPE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00012', A.REQ_TYPE_CD, '1') AS REQ_TYPE_NM , A.ATCH_FILE_ID , A.CB_ATCH_FILE_ID , A.MILESTONE_ID , A.PROCESS_ID , '' AS PROCESS_NM , A.FLOW_ID , '' AS FLOW_NM , A.USE_CD , A.REQ_KEY , A.REQ_MIDDLE_DONE_TXT , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DTM , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DTM_DAY , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , TO_CHAR(A.MODIFY_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP , C.REQ_GRP_ID , C.REQ_GRP_NM , C.REQ_GRP_DESC FROM REQ4100 A INNER JOIN REQ3001 B ON (A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.REQ_ID = B.REQ_ID) INNER JOIN REQ3000 C ON (B.PRJ_GRP_ID = C.PRJ_GRP_ID AND B.REQ_GRP_ID = C.REQ_GRP_ID AND C.USE_CD = '01') WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(NEW_REQ_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_REQ_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'REQ' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_REQ_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(REQ_ID) AS NEW_REQ_ID FROM REQ4100 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID LIKE 'REQ' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' )
INSERT INTO REQ4100 ( PRJ_ID, REQ_ID, PRJ_GRP_ID, REQ_CLS_ID, REQ_ORD ,REQ_USR_ID, REQ_USR_NM, REQ_DTM, REQ_USR_DEPT_NM, REQ_USR_DEPT_ID ,REQ_USR_EMAIL ,REQ_USR_NUM, REQ_NM, REQ_DESC, REQ_PW, REQ_CHARGER_ID ,REQ_ST_DTM, REQ_ED_DTM, REQ_ST_DU_DTM, REQ_ED_DU_DTM, REQ_PRO_TYPE ,REQ_NEW_TYPE, ATCH_FILE_ID, CB_ATCH_FILE_ID, MILESTONE_ID ,PROCESS_ID, FLOW_ID, REQ_KEY ,USE_CD, REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP ,MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #prjId#, #newReqId#, #prjGrpId#, #reqClsId#, #reqOrd# ,#reqUsrId#, #reqUsrNm# ,TO_DATE(REPLACE(#reqDtm#, '-'), 'YYYYMMDD') ,#reqUsrDeptNm#, #reqUsrDeptId#, #reqUsrEmail# ,#reqUsrNum#, #reqNm#, #reqDesc#, #reqPw#, #reqChargerId# ,TO_DATE(REPLACE(#reqStDtm#, '-'), 'YYYYMMDD') ,TO_DATE(REPLACE(#reqEdDtm#, '-'), 'YYYYMMDD') ,TO_DATE(REPLACE(#reqStDuDtm#, '-'), 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI') ,TO_DATE(REPLACE(#reqEdDuDtm#, '-'), 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI') ,'01' ,'01', #atchFileId#, #cbAtchFileId#, #milestroneId# ,#processId#, #flowId#, #reqKey# ,'01', SYSDATE, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# ,SYSDATE, #modifyUsrId#, #modifyUsrIp# )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE REQ4100 A SET REQ_NM = #reqNm# , REQ_DESC = #reqDesc#
, REQ_PW = #reqPw#
, PRJ_ID = #reqPrjId#
, REQ_USR_ID = #reqUsrId# , REQ_USR_NM = SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(#reqUsrId#, 1) , REQ_USR_DEPT_ID = #reqUsrDeptId# , REQ_USR_DEPT_NM = SF_STM6000_DEPT_NM(#licGrpId#,#reqUsrDeptId#, 2) , REQ_USR_EMAIL = SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(#reqUsrId#, 2) , REQ_USR_NUM = SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(#reqUsrId#, 3) , REQ_USR_IMG_ID = SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(#reqUsrId#, 6) , ATCH_FILE_ID = #atchFileId# , MODIFY_DTM = SYSDATE , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# , REQ_CLS_ID = #reqClsId# WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId#
UPDATE REQ4100 A SET REQ_KEY = #reqKey# WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId#
UPDATE REQ4100 A SET REQ_PW = #reqPw# WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM REQ4100 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId#
DELETE FROM REQ4100 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE REQ4100 A SET REQ_CHARGER_ID = #reqChargerId# , MODIFY_DTM = SYSDATE , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.USR_NM , SF_STM6000_DEPT_NM(#licGrpId#, A.DEPT_ID, '2') AS DEPT_NM , A.EMAIL , A.TELNO FROM STM3000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.USR_ID = #reqUsrId#
SELECT A.PRJ_NM , A.PRJ_ACRM FROM PRJ1000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#

SELECT NVL(MAX(T.NEXT_REQ_ORD), '1') AS REQ_ORD FROM ( SELECT NVL( TO_CHAR( TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(A.REQ_ORD, INSTR(A.REQ_ORD, '-')+1))) +1, '1' ) AS NEXT_REQ_ORD FROM REQ4100 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# ) T
sqlMap.update: UPDATE REQ4100 A SET ATCH_FILE_ID = #newAtchFileId# WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM COMTNFILE WHERE 1=1 AND ATCH_FILE_ID = #atchFileId#
DELETE FROM COMTNFILEDETAIL WHERE 1=1 AND ATCH_FILE_ID = #atchFileId#
sqlMap.sql:
SELECT T1.*, ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID , SF_PRJ1000_GRP_NM(A.PRJ_ID) AS PRJ_NM , A.REQ_ID , A.REQ_ORD , A.REQ_CLS_ID , NVL(SF_REQ2000_REQ_CLS_NM(A.PRJ_ID, A.REQ_CLS_ID, '1'), '') AS REQ_CLS_NM , A.REQ_USR_ID , NVL(REQ_USR_NM, SF_STM3000_USR_INFO(A.REQ_USR_ID, '1')) AS REQ_USR_NM , TO_CHAR(A.REQ_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REQ_DTM , A.REQ_USR_DEPT_NM , A.REQ_USR_EMAIL , A.REQ_USR_NUM , A.REQ_NM , A.REQ_DESC , REGEXP_REPLACE (A.REQ_DESC ,'
|
|
' , ' ' ) AS REQ_DESC , A.REQ_CHARGER_ID , D.USR_NM AS REQ_CHARGER_NM , NVL2(A.REQ_ST_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ST_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '') REQ_ST_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_ED_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , '') REQ_ED_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_ST_DU_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ST_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , '') REQ_ST_DU_DTM , NVL2(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.REQ_ED_DU_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , '') REQ_ED_DU_DTM , A.REQ_PRO_TYPE , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00008', A.REQ_PRO_TYPE, '1') AS REQ_PRO_TYPE_NM , A.REQ_NEW_TYPE , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00009', A.REQ_NEW_TYPE, '1') AS REQ_NEW_TYPE_NM , A.REQ_ACCEPT_TXT , A.REQ_TYPE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00012', A.REQ_TYPE_CD, '1') AS REQ_TYPE_NM , A.ATCH_FILE_ID , A.CB_ATCH_FILE_ID , A.MILESTONE_ID , A.PROCESS_ID , '' AS PROCESS_NM , A.FLOW_ID , '' AS FLOW_NM , A.USE_CD , A.REQ_KEY , A.REQ_MIDDLE_DONE_TXT , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DTM , TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DTM_DAY , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , TO_CHAR(A.MODIFY_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM (SELECT * FROM REQ4100) A , STM3000 D WHERE 1=1 AND A.REQ_CHARGER_ID = D.USR_ID(+) ORDER BY A.REQ_PRO_TYPE ASC, TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(A.REQ_ORD, '[^0-9]')) DESC NULLS LAST, A.REQ_DTM DESC, A.REG_DTM DESC ) T1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND T1.REQ_PRO_TYPE = '01'
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM (
) Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS REQ_CNT FROM (
) Z

SELECT SUBT1.PRJ_GRP_ID , SUBT1.PRJ_ID , SUBT1.REQ_ID , SUBT1.REQ_NM , SUBT1.REQ_ORD , SUBT1.REQ_PRO_TYPE , (SELECT SUB_CD_NM FROM STM4001 WHERE LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND MST_CD = 'REQ00008' AND SUB_CD = SUBT1.REQ_PRO_TYPE) AS REQ_PRO_TYPE_NM , SUBT1.REQ_DTM , SUBT1.REG_DTM FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_ID , A.REQ_ID , A.REQ_NM , A.REQ_ORD , A.REQ_PRO_TYPE , A.REQ_DTM , A.REG_DTM FROM REQ4100 A INNER JOIN ( SELECT Z.USR_ID, Z.PRJ_ID FROM PRJ2001 Z INNER JOIN PRJ2000 Y ON ( Z.PRJ_ID = Y.PRJ_ID AND Z.AUTH_GRP_ID = Y.AUTH_GRP_ID AND Z.USR_ID = #usrId#) WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY Z.USR_ID, Z.PRJ_ID ) B ON (A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_GRP_ID = #prjGrpId# ) SUBT1 ORDER BY PRJ_ID, TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(REQ_ORD, '[^0-9]')) NULLS LAST, REQ_DTM DESC, REG_DTM DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM (
) Z

SELECT Z.* FROM (
) Z WHERE 1 = 1 AND Z.RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#
